title: Mark Brickey from the Adventures In Design Podcast
itunes:title: Mark Brickey from the Adventures In Design Podcast
description:
A split 7" as it were! Podcast hosts collide and we have on the show today, Mark Brickey who hosts the spectacular show called Adventures In Design which focuses on design, art and the ability to make a living out of it. While the format may be a bit unconventional (we wander many different places) it's a discussion that enlightened me many times and I hope it does the same for you. We are a part of the Jabberjaw Media podcast Network The Jabberjaw Media Network and this podcast are Presented by our sponsor Sound Rink, an Experience Company

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
